Description:
STUNNING CONTEMPORARY HOME IN TRANQUIL LOCATION
Located in a quiet court, this stunning property is central to Red Rocks Beach and provides a tranquil rural view over the golf ranch.
Immaculately presented, the home is modern with an ambiance of sophistication. The lower level offers a dedicated study, stylish modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances and generous walk in pantry, stunning dining and lounge zone with double height ceilings and bi-fold doors, and a very private master bedroom with walk in robe, en-suite and beautiful lush carpets. An extensive north-facing deck can be accessed from the master bedroom and through the bi-fold doors extending from the lounge and dining zone. The upper level provides an additional 3 spacious bedrooms, 2 with built in robes and corner desks, surrounding a central bathroom. The home is exceptional with stunning timber flooring, extensive north-facing windows, split system heating and cooling, ceiling fans and stunning light fittings.
The property is fully fenced with extensive established landscaping, watertanks, generous north-facing deck with counter leaver umbrella for shade, remote double garage and additional parking for boat or caravan storage.
Quiet and exclusive, this stunning property is only a short distance from popular Red Rocks Beach and central Cowes, and only a short distance from all of Phillip Island’s many attractions. Invest or reside, this impressive property is waiting for you to enjoy. Arrange your inspection today.
Insights: 1/2 Ryan Court, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2017 and 56 other 4 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
CHEAP & CENTRAL
An entry level opportunity to enter the Phillip Island property market with this neat and tidy unit within close proximity to the centre of town and the beach.
Set back off the road in a small quiet block of only 4 units, it features recently replaced carpet and paint, 2 generous bedrooms with built in robes, open plan living area, separate bathroom, courtyard, shed and carport.
With a great tenant already in place paying $220 a week it’s ready to go.

Description:
IMPRESSIVE UNIT IN CENTRAL LOCATION
Immaculately presented, this near new unit is within walking distance to Cowes beaches, shops and cafes.
This fantastic unit offers 2 spacious bedrooms with built in robes, a bathroom with separate bath and shower, an open plan living and dining area extending to an elegant kitchen with gas cooktop and electric oven, and laundry with access to the courtyard. The home is comfortable with lush carpets, split system heating and cooling, and tank water for the garden. A private north facing courtyard is spacious with a paved area and a single lock up garage with plenty of room for the car or for storage.
Currently tenanted, inspection is strictly by appointment, please contact our office to view today!

Amazing investment opportunity!
Located in the heart of Central Cowes, this modern apartment has it all!
Featuring 2 spacious bedrooms with built in robes, one spacious bathroom and open plan living and dining area plus a designer balcony.
Leave the car at home and stroll down to beautiful north facing beaches at Cowes foreshore and enjoy the local restaurants and amenities literally at your doorstep. This property would operate as the perfect holiday rental, generating income, or would suit a permanent residence also.
At this price, in this location, you can't go wrong! This is the life!

Description:
Charm in Central Cowes!
This low maintenance property is an absolute hidden gem situated in the heart of Cowes.
Only minutes from the beach, local restaurants and cafes, local primary school and all amenities in Cowes this luxury townhouse provides seclusion and privacy. This double story townhouse boasts 2 spacious bedrooms, 1 bathroom with magnificent spa bath plus a powder room, 2 livings areas which both lead out onto a sunny court yard areas.
The two outdoor entertaining areas complete the Phillip Island experience, allowing you to totally relax after enjoying your day at the beach. Enjoy the private downstairs courtyard and relax whilst the upstairs balcony provides a secluded lounge area to watch the sunset.
Complete with a single lock up garage with plenty of storage, internal access to the courtyard, this property is perfect for the savvy investor, an ideal holiday home or permanent residence for the family.
Properties like this don't last long, an inspection today is a must!

Titles are anticipated mid 2018.

Description:
CLOSE TO EVERYTHING AT AN AFFORDABLE PRICE
Parklands on Settlement Road offers safe and secure living in a location that has you close to everything.
This strata titled unit features 2 bedrooms, the main bedroom has direct access to a spacious bathroom. The design offers light filled open plan living area, with veranda on both the front and back of the home.
Complete with large kitchen and spacious dining area and private courtyard.
Connected to the building you will find your own single car garage.
Walking distance to supermarket, doctors, schools and Cowes beach this is a must inspect for those looking for an affordable townhouse.
Call today to arrange your own private inspection.

A rare acre gem!
This is a rare opportunity to secure the most central a 1 acre (approx) allotment in the centre of Cowes!
Close proximity to schools, sporting facilities, shops, cafe's, restaurants and an easy 1.3km stroll straight down Dunsmore Road to the pristine Cowes bay beach.
Perfect site to build your next home, a cleared - level block with plenty of room for shedding, boats and caravans.
Complete with a rural aspect, this lovely block won't last long!

Description:
A great holiday home with something extra!
Here is a great opportunity for an investor/developer.
This substantial property is positioned on a 780sm approx corner allotment. Perfect as either a holiday home or rental property, this property can accommodate a large family together with the boat, caravan, cars etc.
Downstairs comprises a double garage, internal access to a rumpus room, potential kitchenette/dining area, bedroom, bathroom, laundry and toilet.
Upstairs is accessible by both internal and external stairs, and comprises a spacious open plan living/dining/kitchen area, 3 bedrooms, bathroom and toilet.
A large north facing deck is a feature. Great for outdoor dining or relaxation, big enough to accommodate family and guests.
An easy walk to the beach, about 200m, and the Cowes Boat Ramp is not much further.
Well worth an inspection.
This property in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Thoughtfully Designed
This contemporary home has everything you need and more! Ideally located in the highly desirable Shearwater Estate, this property will suit families or holiday home buyers. Thoughtfully designed this near new home boasts quality inclusions blended with the effortless style of modern living.
With 4 bedrooms and open plan living, the clever layout, both inside and out, ensures that there is space for all the family. The free flowing kitchen, dining and family area is perfect for large gatherings.
The backyard has been designed with low maintenance, easy living and enjoying life at the beach in mind.
Just minutes from schools and shops, Cowes Golf Club and Silverleaves beachfront, this property is the answer for those seeking contemporary modern living. So dont miss out on making this your new home.

Description:
NEAR NEW IMMACULATE HOME
This near new immaculate home enjoys all the advantages of low-maintenance living with modern fittings and fixtures throughout. An open and inviting light filled living and dining area is complemented by the spacious kitchen, complete with stainless steel appliances including a 900mm gas cooktop, plenty of cupboard space and a walk in pantry. Three great sized bedrooms (main with ensuite and WIR) offer ample accommodation with a second stylish central bathroom. Outside, the image of appealing low-maintenance lifestyle is further enhanced by a sunny courtyard space and garden area while a secure remote double garage , split system heating/cooling, floating floors and the convenient element of being located within a quiet neighborhood complete the package. Be quick to secure this spacious single level sensation –the perfect investment property with an attractive return and reliable tenant.
Additional features include:
- NBN Internet provisions

- Off road side access to back yard ideal for boat etc

Description:
Dual Access Property - Looking for a great investment?
This neatly presented 3 bedroom home is located in a quiet pocket of Cowes, on a 609 sqm (approx) allotment.
With a tenant currently in place, this property is ready for the right investor.
The home offers split system heating and cooling and the cozy option of a slow combustion wood fire. Three generous bedrooms, the master with ensuite and walk in robe - and built in robes to the further two.
Floating timber floors throughout the bright lounge, dining and kitchen - with dishwasher, wall oven and electric cook top.
The beautiful bush setting can be enjoyed on the timber front decking, with a glass sliding door to access the living zone.
A double carport has direct access from a private back lane, and offers a great undercover entertaining area or place for the caravan or boat. The property is also wheelchair friendly, and has 4 x 500 gallon water tanks for the gardens.
Situated close to the popular Red Rocks Beach, and only a 5 minute drive to the Cowes shopping precinct, Primary School, Doctors Surgery and Sporting facilities.
What are you waiting for?
This Cowes property is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.
Insights: 63 other 3 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
ELEGANT BEACHSIDE LIVING WITH WATER VIEWS
This home has it ALL!!! This magnificent home offers a large open living plan with 5 bedrooms and 3 living spaces with Stunning Ocean and water views overlooking the golf course.
A unique aspect of this home is the ability to have 2 homes in in one. The main living area offers spectacular views with a cozy wood heater – large country kitchen (New dishwasher) with handmade tiles with a large dining space with 4 bedrooms and a bathroom. The 1st part of the home offers a large living space and an additional bedroom and toilet & laundry facilities.
A special feature of the unique home is the large verandah that leads you to the undercover deck water views that literally takes your breath away. This unique property boast a fully fenced landscaped garden with an additional large shed at the rear of the property and loads of extra storage under the deck/house. The current owners said 'We love the views and the wildlife at our back fence, it feels like you are in the country yet just minutes to the beach'.
If you have been looking for a home with a point of difference and wish to get away from the traditional type home into a modern home with lots of space and light, call now for a private inspection.
Insights: 98 RED ROCKS ROAD, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2017 and 14 other 5 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
WHEN POSITION COUNTS
This beautiful 2 bedroom unit is perfectly located only one house from the popular beach and within walking distance to the Cowes shops, restaurants and Cowes Yacht Club.
The unit is in a small group of 6 and being at the rear of the complex is extremely private and quiet. Perfect for that holiday property or for retirement.
Offering spacious open plan living and being recently refurbished there is nothing to spend, just move in and enjoy. The landscaped areas and brick veneer construction are designed for low maintenance living and the unit is complete with a single lock up garage and lovely courtyard.
This property is excellent value and will not last long!

Description:
COMPACT HOME ON SPACIOUS CORNER BLOCK
Located within walking distance to central Cowes, this neat and tidy home offers a fantastic entry level opportunity or investment / development potential (STCA).
With 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, spacious kitchen with adjoining open plan dining and lounge area, separate family room with split system, undercover rear deck area and detached double garage, this home is a compact little beach getaway or permanent home. Located on a spacious 637m2 corner block (approx.), this property is packed with potential and priced to sell.
Enjoy now or develop for future enjoyment. Do not miss this opportunity!

Description:
STONES THROW TO THE BEACH
This charming home is perfectly positioned only a short walk from the beautiful Red Rocks beach and close to the centre of Cowes.
The property is north facing and offers 3 bedrooms & 2 bathrooms. There is a spacious open kitchen/ living/dining plus second living area and separate bar room. Exposed beams & wood fire in the lounge add to the cottage appeal of this home.
The expansive verandah and covered rear decking which overlook the easy care gardens are perfect for entertaining or relaxing summer evenings.
Complete with double carport, solar roof panels, separate entrance to rear suitable for boat/ caravan parking this property is well priced and beautifully presented.

Description:
NORTH FACING LOCATED APPROX 100 FROM COWES FORESHORE
Situated approximately 100m from the pristine shores of Cowes Beach, this property offers the perfect retreat.
Located in a quiet street within walking distance to Cowes central (quicker by beach), this home offers 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms with a separate laundry.
Two living areas, downstairs being a large entertaining zone, with the upstairs kitchen/dining/living flowing out on to a north facing deck - the ideal area to soak up the sun and relax.
A carport to the side leads to a lockable garage for all of the beach toys. Low maintenance gardens complete the perfect picture
The property features beautiful established trees and gardens, verandas, private court yard and additional parking space, ideal for boat or caravan storage.
With its north facing aspect and quiet street location, this property offers a lovely family home or holiday retreat.

Description:
EXCLUSIVE SHEARWATER ESTATE- JUST MOVE IN
Near new home featuring stunning decked area, crescent drive with parking for everyone, two separate bedroom and living areas, bright sunny kitchen with stone benches,3 /4 bedrooms, exclusive Shearwater Estate - read on!
This beautiful and established near new 6 star energy rated home is located in the exclusive Shearwater Estate in Cowes. An easy stroll to the Golf Course and the north facing Silverleaves beach, is also a short walk to central Cowes.
Inviting undercover alfresco and open deck area off the lounge room through double sliding glass doors. Perfect for bbq and entertaining, or sit on the deck in the sun overlooking the rear established treed garden.
Room for cars, boats, caravans etc, with dual access and a semi circular drive to a double garage with remote controlled door, plus roller door access to the rear garden. Additional third toilet located in the garage.
The home also features three large bedrooms with a fourth bedroom/study or lounge room. Bright sunny chefs kitchen, stainless steel Smeg 900mm stove and range hood, expansive stone waterfall bench, butlers pantry, the list goes on !
The main bedroom is privately located towards the front, has a large walk through robe and spacious ensuite.
The living area with its double sliding doors and large windows welcomes the natural light and is enhanced with the adjoining open living room with north facing double sliding doors overlooking an outdoor private rockery.
LED down lights throughout, reverse cycle air conditioner, built in robes, fruit trees, established gardens.
An inspection will surely impress.
